findings.title: Unprotected transfer in transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function does not have any protection mechanism to prevent unauthorized transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom in transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function does not have sufficient protection against unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected increment in increment function
findings.description: The increment function does not protect against unauthorized increments, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected decrement in decrement function
findings.description: The decrement function does not check for underflow before decrementing, which can lead to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected permit in permit function
findings.description: The permit function does not have sufficient protection, allowing unauthorized access.

findings.title: _transfer function is not secure
findings.description: The _transfer function does not have sufficient security measures.

findings.title: _mint function is not secure
findings.description: The _mint function has a security vulnerability.

findings.title: _burn function is not secure
findings.description: The _burn function does not have access control and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: _approve function is not secure
findings.description: The _approve function has a security vulnerability.

findings.title: _beforeTokenTransfer function is not secure
findings.description: The _beforeTokenTransfer function has a security vulnerability.
